entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Sijil Tinggi Pelajaran Malaysia (STPM) - minimum CGPA 2.0 in 2 subjects.

course_content.core:
Year 1 Semester 1 Introduction to Education Curriculum Design for the Primary Years Educational Psychology Schooling, Socialisation and Identity MPU (U1)
Ethnic Relationship
BM Komunikasi 2 Ethnic Relationship BM Komunikasi 2 School-Based Experience-1 Year 1 Semester 2 Child Growth and Development MPU (U2) – Information Literacy Visual and Performing Arts in Education Year 1 Semester 3 Educational Philosophy Understanding Teaching in School Digital Technology for Teaching & Learning Assessment and Evaluation in the Primary Years Introduction to International Baccalaureate Programmes School-Based Experience-2 Year 2 Semester 1 Introduction to Science and Technology in the Primary School Social Studies in the Primary School Numeracy in the Primary School Literacy in the Primary School MPU (U4) Service Learning School-Based Experience-3 Year 2 Semester 2 Teaching Mathematics via Inquiry-1 Teaching Science via Inquiry Teaching English in Primary School Year 2 Semester 3 Teaching Mathematics via inquiry-2 Teaching English as an Additional Language Primary Years Programme-IB Personal, Social, and Physical Education MPU (U3) Culture of Indigenous Malaysia School-Based Experience-4 Year 3 Semester 1 Values Education Introduction to Action Research Methodology School Organisation and Management Inclusive Education in Primary School IB PYP in Practice School-Based Experience-5 Year 3 Semester 2 Transition to Teaching Advanced Studies

STPM.text: Sijil Tinggi Pelajaran Malaysia (STPM) - minimum CGPA 2.0 in 2 subjects.

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Pass SPM with 5 credits in any subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: Pass 5 O Level at Grade C levels in any subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass UEC with Grade B in 3 subjects.

course_content.core: Semester 1 Major Instruments – 1 Keyboard Studies Musicianship – 1 (Aural Training) Rudiments of Music Theory – 1 Music in Context Concert Practice-1 English for Communication Chamber Music Mentoring Service Learning (Community and Service) Event Internship 1 Semester 2 Professional Presentation Skills Major Instruments – 2 Study Skills (ATL) Musicianship – 2 (Aural Skill) Keyboard Studies 2 Rudiments of Music Theory 2 Basic Music History Concert Practice-2 Event Internship 2

SPM.text: Pass SPM with 5 credits in any subjects.

O-Level.text: Pass 5 O Level at Grade C levels in any subjects.

UEC.text: Pass UEC with Grade B in 3 subjects.

entry_requirements_raw.Degree: minimum CGPA 2.50 (Degree in a related field).  5 years of experience in the education field (if the Bachelor Degree is less than CGPA 2.50)

course_content.core: Exploring Teaching and Learning Teaching & learning in Action Developing Professional Practice IB Curriculum Processes IB Teaching and Learning IB Assessment and learning IB Professional Learning Understanding Research Methodology Educational Research Practice

Degree.text: 5 years of experience in the education field (if the Bachelor Degree is less than CGPA 2.50)

entry_requirements_raw.Masters: A Masters degree (Level 7) as approved by University Senate or Training and or professional experience (approximately 3-4 years) in the field of education.

course_content.core:
Year 1 Semester 1 – 3 Compulsory courses
Semester 2 – 3 Specialisation courses Year 2 Semester 1 – 2 Specialisation courses
Semester 2 – Dissertation Year 3 Semester 1 – 2 Specialisation courses
Semester 2 – Dissertation

Masters.text: A Masters degree (Level 7) as approved by University Senate or Training and or professional experience (approximately 3-4 years) in the field of education.
